welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lengerich, Germany! Get ready to experience the quaint charm of our town, known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore all that Lengerich has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building at Münster Osnabrück International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guetersloh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free for up to 2 hours.
